code.styles: //============================================================================// ACCORDION //============================================================================// Accordion variables. $toggle-color:$color-primary;// Helper classes. .list-reset{@include list-reset}.screen-reader-text{@include screen-reader-text}// Accordion component. .accordion{&__title{align-items:center;display:flex;justify-content:space-between}&__content{height:0;max-height:0;opacity:0;overflow:hidden;transition:all 0.5s ease-in-out,opacity 0.6s ease-in-out}&__item{+ .accordion__item{margin-top:rem(20)}&--expanded{.accordion__content{height:100%;max-height:1000vh;opacity:1;padding-bottom:rem(40)}}}}// Toggle buttons. .toggle{@include plus-minus-button($toggle-color,$bar-width:rem(15));&[aria-expanded="true"]{@include plus-minus-button-active($toggle-color)}}
